website.name: Creative Stage
website.description: Creative Stage offers art classes in different mediums that are available for all ages and all levels. They help people learn more about their story, approach, and what their studio has to offer, helping to unleash your inner artist!
website.target_audience: Children, families, and adults seeking creative expression and art education

design.layout: Responsive design with mobile-first approach and accessibility features

typography.headers: Fredoka One, Comic Sans MS - Playful, rounded, child-friendly
typography.body: Open Sans, Arial - Clean, readable, accessible
typography.accent: Pacifico - Hand-drawn style for special elements

animations.page_transitions: Smooth sliding effects with artistic elements

visual_elements.shapes: Rounded corners, organic shapes, hand-drawn elements
visual_elements.patterns: Paint splashes, crayon textures, watercolor backgrounds
visual_elements.illustrations: Custom artwork featuring diverse children creating art

hero_section.title: üé® Welcome to Creative Stage! üåü
hero_section.subtitle: Where Every Child is an Artist Waiting to Shine!
hero_section.description: Join our magical world of colors, creativity, and endless possibilities. From tiny tots to big kids, we make art FUN for everyone!
hero_section.background: Animated watercolor splash with diverse children painting, crafting, and laughing

about_section.title: üåà Our Magical Mission
about_section.main_content: At Creative Stage, we believe every child has a rainbow of creativity inside them! We're not just about making pretty pictures - we're about building confidence, friendship, and joy through art.
about_section.philosophy: üéØ Our Super Special Approach: It's not about being perfect, it's about having FUN and trying new things!
